title.rendered: Full Cheeks Odor Control Small Pet Paper Litter & Bedding – Grey

content.rendered:
Ingredients:
Rabbit with Ground Bone, Olive Oil, Pumpkin Seed, Potassium Chloride, Organic Cranberries, Organic Spinach, Organic Broccoli, Organic Beets, Sodium Phosphate Monobasic, Organic Carrots, Organic Squash, Organic Apples, Organic Blueberries, Choline Chloride, Dried Pediococcus Acidilactici Fermentation Product, Dried Lactobacillus Acidophilus Fermentation Product, Dried Bifidobacterium Longum Fermentation Product, Dried Enterococcus Faecium Fermentation Product, Taurine, Tocopherols (Preservative), Calcium Carbonate, Zinc Proteinate, Zinc Sulfate, Iron Sulfate, Iron Proteinate, Vitamin E Supplement, Niacin, Copper Sulfate, Copper Proteinate, Manganese Sulfate, Sodium Selenite, Manganese Proteinate, Thiamine Mononitrate, Pyridoxine Hydrochloride, Vitamin D3 Supplement, Calcium Iodate

Guaranteed Analysis

Crude protein (min) 30%, Crude fat (min) 15%, Crude fiber (max) 3.5%, Moisture (max) 11%.

excerpt.rendered:
DESCRIPTION
A cozy home starts with clean, comfy bedding, and Full Cheeks Small Pet Unscented Classic Grey Paper Litter & Bedding leaves their paws dry and cushioned and their habitat cleaner for you. Made with love for rabbits, ferrets, guinea pigs and rats, this soft, ultra-absorbent paper litter and bedding keeps pets dry and maintains freshness. It is also proven to help control ammonia odors. We believe caring for your furry little one should be as easy as loving them, and now it can be. Our products are specially made for them, and are designed to be simple for you. All they need to do is what they do best: give lots of love. Only at PetSmart.

Features:

Pet-Safe Formula proven to help control ammonia odors
99% Dust Free
Ultra-Absorbent
95% Post-Consumer Recycled Paper Pellets
Contains Paper, Zeolite, and Sodium Bicarbonate
Environmentally Friendly
Unscented

Includes: 20 L

Intended Pet(s): Rabbits, Ferrets, Guinea Pigs, Rats

Material(s): Recycled Paper Pellets

Color: Classic Grey

Product Weight: Usable Volume: 20 L

Buy this product on petsmart.com
